Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1GHa transferring AA(18-24) to AA(9-17), Brevinin-1GHc

Literature.Title: Evaluating the Bioactivity of a Novel Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptide Brevinin-1GHa from the Frog Skin Secretion of Hylarana guentheri and Its Analogues.
Literature.Author: Chen Q, Cheng P, Ma C, Xi X, Wang L, Zhou M, Bian H, Chen T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=32µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=128µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=128µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=512µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=256µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=512µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MIC=128µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MBC=128µM)
